message.content:
cs.CL, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.CV. 

The paper focuses on natural language processing tasks, specifically on creating a universal cross-lingual representation of documents. This suggests that the paper is likely to belong to the sub-category of Computation and Language (cs.CL). Additionally, the paper uses a neural machine translation (NMT) framework, which is a common technique in the sub-category of Artificial Intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also involves document classification, which is a task commonly studied in Information Retrieval (cs.IR) and Machine Learning (cs.LG). Finally, the paper may also belong to the sub-category of Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (cs.CV) as document vectorization is a common technique in image processing.
